bill_title: require prior written notice to policyholders of premium increases for individual health insurance.

bill_versions.bill_text: FOR AN ACT ENTITLED, An Act to require prior written notice to policyholders of premium increases for individual health insurance. BE IT ENACTED BY THE LEGISLATURE OF THE STATE OF SOUTH DAKOTA: Section 1. That chapter 58-17 be amended by adding thereto a NEW SECTION to read as follows: At least forty-five days before a premium rate increase is to be effective, the carrier shall notify the policyholder in writing that the premium rate for the policyholder's individual health benefit plan will be increased. 350 copies of this document were printed by the South Dakota Legislative Research Council at a cost of $.027 per page. . Insertions into existing statutes are indicated by underscores. Deletions from existing statutes are indicated by overstrikes.

action_log.status_text: First read in Senate and referred to
Scheduled for Committee hearing on this date
